message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you consider that?
I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to make a slight concession and sell the product to you for $10000.
